Translingual[edit]

Symbol[edit]

Hotel

  1. The letter H in the ICAO spelling alphabet.

German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

Borrowed from French hôtel.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /hoˈtɛl/
  • audio
    		(file)
  • Rhymes: -ɛl

Noun[edit]

Hotel n (genitive Hotels, plural Hotels)

  1. hotel
